headline: PPG recognized as ‘Exceptional Workplace’ by Gallup for third consecutive year
summary: PITTSBURGH, March 13, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced that it has received a third consecutive Gallup Exceptional Workplace Award (GEWA). This annual award recognizes high-performing companies that align their business strategies around employees. Gallup found that PPG continued to engage and develop its people in innovative ways, setting new benchmarks for workplace excellence.
